title: Ground Floor Renovated 1-Bed in Superb Location! Heat & Water Included
posting_body: ['1925 Grove Ave - B3', 'Berwyn, IL 60402', 'Available early October!', 'Please email leasing with showing requests and inquiries.', 'Rehabbed, spacious, condo quality 1 bed!', 'Apartment features an eat-in kitchen, granite counters, 42” wood cabinets, sconces, and more!', "Don't miss this!", 'Notable Features:', '- Great, spacious layout', '- Dining room/office space', '- Dishwasher & microwave', '- Heat and water included', '- Beautifully landscaped courtyard', '- Storage unit included (based on availability)', '- Bike room', '- Renovated laundry room in building', '- Small pet friendly (cats and dogs up to 40lbs, breed restrictions, pet fee)', '- Free street parking', '- City of Berwyn parking lot 1 block away with off street parking for rent ($45/quarter, $150/year)', '- Responsive onsite property manager', 'Photos are of the exact or very similar unit on site.', 'Lease Terms:', '$300 Nonrefundable Move-In Fee', 'No Security Deposit', 'Heat and water is included', 'Tenant responsible for cooking gas and electric', 'General Credit and Income Requirements:', '- 650+ credit score', '- Gross monthly income should be at lease 3x the rent', '(There are some exceptions to these requirements, such as being a full time student and having a cosigner)', 'Location Features:', "- Conveniently located near grocery stores (Costco, Meijer, Tony's, Jewel), shopping (North Riverside Shopping Mall) and numerous dining and beverage establishments", '- Easy access to Blue Line, Pink Line, Metra, Oak Park Ave Pace Bus, Cermak Pace bus', '- Berwyn is conveniently located within one mile of two major transportation arteries, the Eisenhower Expressway (I-290) to the north and the Stevenson Expressway (I-55) to the south.', "- Berwyn has three commuter rail stations, serviced by Metra along the BNSF Railway, which offer Berwyn residents ready access to area jobs and visitors easy access to Berwyn's many attractions.", "- Pace bus service is extensive and links conveniently to the CTA's elevated Blue Line trains.", "- Additionally, both O'Hare International Airport and Midway International Airport are within easy driving distance.", "Don't miss this!", 'Meltzer Real Estate', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
